meaningMnemonic: If you take your <kanji>writing</kanji> and <kanji>fix</kanji> it, you are taking your writing and rewriting it. This word means <vocabulary>to rewrite</vocabulary>, because the fixing is really heavy, so regular revisions won't do.
readingMnemonic: The readings come from 書く and 直す. Know those and you'll know how to read this word too!
